children.name: according
children.sourceText: You may do according to your desires.

children.name: am
children.sourceText: Fear not; behold, I am a Lamanite.

children.name: battle
children.sourceText: Let us keep of our wine till we go against the Nephites to battle.

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: Behold, we have escaped from the Nephites, and they sleep; and behold we have taken of their wine and brought with us.
